segments.text: I see a woman diligently drying a plate in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is completely fixed on the task at hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink, however, is a very different story entirely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running freely from the faucet, filling the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the front edge in a continuous sheet onto the cabinet doors and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see a widening puddle forming on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes is already submerged in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how completely unaware she seems of the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her face shows absolutely no reaction to the rising puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she feels the cold water seeping into her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of task-focused concentration is almost disturbing given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The running water is going to cause serious damage to those wooden cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR
